keywords: ['jazz song', 'double bass', 'percussion', 'piano', 'male voice', 'meaningless words', 'jazz drumming', 'moderate tempo']
caption: This jazz song features the main melody played on the piano. The double bass plays jazz basslines using half note intervals and jazz fills. The percussion plays a complicated jazz rhythm mostly focusing on the snare hits. Another percussion is played using sticks sounding like a congo. A male voice speaks some meaningless phrase. This song can be played in a bar.
